Common argument of diagnostic functions

common_DxArg.Rd

Common argument of diagnostic functions

Arguments

DxDataFile

A file of clinical diagnostic data with at least 3 columns: "MemberID", "ICD", and "Date"
idColName

A column for MemberID of DxDataFile.
icdColName

A column for ICD of DxDataFile
dateColName

A column for Date of DxDataFile
icd10usingDate

ICD-10 using date
isDescription

Category or description of standard classification methods for ICD diagnostic codes. By default, it set to True (standard description).
groupDataType

Four Stratified methods can chosen: CCS ('ccs'), CCS levels ('ccslvl1', 'ccslvl2', 'ccslvl3', 'ccslvl4'), PheWAS ('PheWAS'), comorbidities ('ahrq','charlson', 'elix'), precise or fuzzy customized method ('customGrepIcdGroup', 'customIcdGroup'). Change it to any of the other possible variables, default it set to "ccs".
CustomGroupingTable

Define the grouping categories. `IcdDxToCustom` needs a dataset with two columns: "Group", "ICD"; "Group" defines one or more disease categories. "ICD" defines a list of disease-related ICD codes. `IcdDxToCustomGrep`needs a dataset with two columns: "Group", "grepIcd"; "Group" defines one or more disease categories. "grepICD" defines disease-related ICD code character strings containing a regular expression.
selectedCaseFile

Table for selectedCases. Default is 'NULL'

Details

Common argument of diagnostic functions
